### What is Quarto?

Quarto is a markup language which can be used to generate beautiful technical or scientific documents.

### What can be done with it?

Many things can be done like:

* Blogs/Websites
* Articles
* Presentations
* Book

and also one can translate with different kinds of document format like `html`, `pdf`, `pptx`, `docx`, `odt` etc. with an ease of simple commands. For more I recommend you to check out the official [Quarto website](https://quarto.org/).
